question: Q1. How many chambers does the human heart have?
Q2. What are the upper chambers of the heart called?
Q3. Which chamber pumps oxygen-rich blood to the body?
Q4. What is the function of the tricuspid valve?

options.a: Controls blood flow from the left atrium to the left ventricle
options.b: Controls blood flow from the right ventricle to the pulmonary artery
options.c: Controls blood flow from the right atrium to the right ventricle

question: Q5. Which blood vessel carries oxygenated blood from the lungs to the left atrium?
